channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2B][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 15, 2026, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Dec 11, 13:19 UTC
Update - The current maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find the new information regarding the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2B region.

Start time : 15/01/2026 07:30 UTC
End time : 15/01/2026 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS][Managed vSphere] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
Dec 16, 09:50 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 16, 09:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 16/12/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 19/12/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [ERI1][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Racks E104A01 - E104A02 incident notification
item.description:
Dec 11, 12:06 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer has been resolved.

Start time : 11/12/2025 09:50 UTC
End time : 11/12/2025 11:58 UTC
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 11, 11:05 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : All servers in the Rack E104A01 are available.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 11, 10:05 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer in ERI1, racks E104A01 and E104A02.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 11/12/2025 09:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Public and private server interfaces have lost network access in the specified racks.
Customers Impact : Customers are unable to access their public and private interfaces for their servers located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [BHS/YYZ][Managed vSphere] - Veeam External Service incident notification
item.description:
Dec 4, 14:58 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere offer has been resolved.

Start time : 28/11/2025 23:00 UTC
End time : 04/12/2025 10:56 UTC
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Dec 3, 03:49 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the BHS and YYZ regions.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 28/11/2025 23:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Veeam external job fail
Customers Impact : Customers may experience an error "Failed to open VDDK disk".
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Racks R805L16 incident notification
item.description:
Nov 27, 09:41 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the rack R805L16 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 27/11/2025 02:20 UTC
End time : 27/11/2025 09:40 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Nov 27, 05:40 UTC
Update - Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : We would like to inform you that a significant number of hosts are now operational.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 27, 02:26 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer in RBX8, rack R805L16.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 27/11/2025 02:20 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All hosts in the rack R805L16 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
